attributes.action: Press criminal charges against the senior executive team of Northern Rock.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: The taxpayer has had to foot the bill for the nationalisation of a private bank due to a flawed business strategy. This money could have been earmarked for schools and hospitals. Those who were responsible for this should be tried in a court of law and have their personal assets seized to help pay the ruinous bill that has emerged as a result of their activities.

rejection.details: Your request is a police matter.
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
Issues for which an e-petition is not the appropriate channel
